meanings.sent1: I lol when I watch funny videos online.
meanings.sent2: She always lol when she hears a good joke.
meanings.sent3: The movie was so hilarious that I couldn't help but lol throughout.
meanings.sent4: His jokes were so funny that the whole room began to lol uncontrollably.
meanings.sent5: The comedian's performance made the audience lol non-stop.

meanings.definition: An expression of amusement or laughter
meanings.sent1: His lol echoed through the room after hearing the joke.
meanings.sent2: The chat was filled with lol after the funny meme was shared.
meanings.sent3: The lol in the room indicated that everyone was having a great time.
meanings.sent4: Her contagious lol brightened up the whole atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The lol in response to the pun was music to my ears.

meanings.definition: To find something funny or amusing
meanings.sent1: I lol at his jokes even if I've heard them before.
meanings.sent2: She tends to lol at the silliest things.
meanings.sent3: I couldn't help but lol at the cat's funny antics.
meanings.sent4: The children lol at the clown's antics during the show.
meanings.sent5: Even on a bad day, she manages to lol at something.
